statements: DELETE FROM billing_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM billing_analysis WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 OR transaction_amount < 500 AND billing_description LIKE '%late%';
DELETE FROM abnormal_billing_practices WHERE reason = 'credit card fraud';
DELETE FROM billing_patterns WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM abnormal_billing_practices WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM BillingPatterns WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM AbnormalBilling WHERE user_id = 10 AND reason LIKE '%fraud%';
